title: FTSE 100 September Contract Daily Forecast - 06 September 2019
text:
FTSE 100 September Contract Daily Forecast - 06 September 2019

Jason SenStock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 06, 2019 06:50AM ET) By

www.investing.com/analysis/ftse-100-september-contract-daily-forecast--06-september-2019-200462242 FTSE 100 September Contract Daily Forecast - 06 September 2019 By By Jason Sen | 1 hour ago (Sep 06, 2019 06:50AM ET)

Follow Ftse September Contract Chart holding first resistance at 7270/80 targets 7255/50. A break lower targets 7235 &minor support at 7230/7220. On further losses look for a buying opportunity at 7195/90 with stops below 7180. Bulls need a break above 7300 to target 7320/25 before a retest of the high this week at 7350/55. On a break higher look for 7380/90. Above 7400 targets 7410, 7420, 7435 & 7455/60.

FTSE 100 September Contract Daily Forecast - 06 September 2019
description: Stocks Analysis by Jason Sen covering: FTSE 100. Read Jason Sen's latest article on Investing.com
